Blog.post: Bogger, yay i cant wait till i see Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow! eh yeah okay, well it looks hella cool okay :D Well all in all today has been pretty much a bummer really, that... PERSON i hate all so very much came around and i was MADE to ask if she would like a drink >: and skool was a drag all round ey... BUT IM STILL HERE T_T YAY THE GAME FINISHED DOWNLOADING!!! im going to play it now RAAA :D:D:D buh byee blog... IM OFF TO SAVE THE WORLD!!!

Blogger, well it has been the second day back at skool, and i cant wait till i leave that place forever!! there isnt many things i will miss at that joint! I've just been going through some of my chat files for MSN... well in particular one that belongs to an old friend that i dont speak to anymore... was i really that blind to see all this? why did she do this at all? im very lucky to have gotten out now... or it could have been alot worse. but i am lucky to have someone to keep me standing up stright through all this... and im very, oh so very greatful! thankyou so much, i love you! Well to next time blogger...as my king would say... Fair Thee Well!

Blogger, -Perfect- You're the perfect girlfriend. Which means you're rare or that you cheated :P You're the kind of chick that can hang out with your boyfriend's friends and be silly. You don't care about presents or about going to fancy placed. Hell, just hang out. You're just happy being around your boyfriend. urlLink What Kind of Girlfriend Are You? brought to you by urlLink www.quizilla.com urlLink

Blogger, Gee, if your dad told you he would be around at 10.00 in the morning to take you out and he wasnt here by 11.30 and you begin to wonder what has happened to him and you find out that the football was more important than taking your daughter out... would you be pissed off?! would you be more pissed off is this wasnt the first time that this has happened but the third? god i fucking hate him sometimes! yeah just had to say that... i feel better now blog... i will write more later.

Blogger, Amazing... thats all i can say really... there is just no way to put this into words, im not even going to try to ey. damn my mother for making me come home so early, and damn public transport that i have to take everytime!!! ahh well i guess it cant be helpped... thats all from me this cold afternoon... port for tonight blog

Blogger, wow! what a boring day! I have English, Art essay and a Art project to do. GREAT FUN! I cant wait till tomorrow tho, he's coming over to sleep and maybe i might go with to see him read some of his poems... depends really Then on Friday im catching up with my best mate and other friends to see a movie... King Arthor i think. i got a mobile for my birthday (only because i stay out late at night and it just makes sense) and i gave the number to one person, now everyone knows it and ppl are msging me all over the place :S its weird really. Well homework to be done and not enough time to do it, till next time Blog.

Blogger, Today was amazing! i love spending time with him, we stayed in Kings Park till it got dark and the lights of the city was breath-taking. i really didnt want to leave, but of course, i had too. too bad. i cant wait till thursday, its gonna be fun! i got my brother a poster, he asked for Ozzy, but JV's didnt have any. so i got him this peep show one. its really awesome and hell there are some hot chicks on there. but my mum didnt agree but fuck her :P anyways dearest bloggers, must be off!

Blogger, This i found off the Michael Moore (god) site, urlLink www.michaelmoore.com and i was like... yeah why not ey. i think that it would be better than that livejournal shit. im very worried at the moment tho, im worried because someone so very close to me is freaking me out... i hope he is okay. please be okay. well dear bloggers of this community, empire or nation... whatever, i'm off anyways, its my brothers birthday today, also my best friends. Happy birthday to you both.
